title: Rajasthan govt to pay influencers up to Rs 5 lakh for running ads
selftext: Rajasthan Govt has announced official policy to pay influencers. Any person with 10,000+ followers on Instagram, FB, Twitter will be given ads upto ₹5 lakh per month by Congress Govt.
comments: 10,000+ that's it? This is definitely a scam to give money to their party low level members
Following footsteps of ruling party at the center who raised tender for this..
